moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 h6: ? This is one of those useless move that wastes a vital tempo. Don't play them unless they are needed to stop a full scale attack.
moves.4. d4: Since he neglected to develop, I grab the center.
moves.5. dxe5: Hoping for ...fxe5?, Nxe5! Nxe5??, Qh5+!! winning.
moves.6... Qe7 7. Bf4 Nxe5 8. Bxe5 dxe5 9. Bb5: I switch my attack from f7 to the queen wing.
moves.11... Rd8 12. O-O: The threat of mate was kind of annoying.
moves.13. Qxa7 Ne7 14. Nc3 Qc6 15. Nh4: I threaten to breach another wall...
moves.15... O-O 16. Rad1 g5 17. Nf5 Bc5: I started looking for a way to remove the bishop without moving blacks queen. I have a potential fork on e7.
moves.19. exf5 Bb6 20. Qa3: I aim at the weak e7 square...
moves.20... Bc5 21. Qb3+ Kg7 22. Ne2 Bb6 23. N: ? Wrong way to fend off the knight. This allows...
moves.27... Rg7 28. Qf8+: He saw mate was inevitable and resigned.
